S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-803: derbynet/DerbyNetAutoStart.java test fails intermittently with org.apache.derby.iapi.services.context.ShutdownException
Let the test wait between closing client connections and shutting down the engine. This way, the server threads get time to close the connections cleanly before the engine is taken down.
Patch contributed by Fernanda Pizzorno.
